description: T.1 Oak - Crown Lift to 7m from ground level & 1.5m lateral reduction to 2 extended limbs over the parking area.T.3 Yew - 1m Holistic crown reduction & shaping.T.5 Ash - Remove single low branch over neighbour's drive.T.6 Cherry - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.7 & T.8 Sycamore & Elder - 2-3m Lateral reduction to boundary.T.9 Cypress - 1-2m Lateral reduction.
